structure.unit: A JUSTICE AND PUBLIC SAFETY CABINET

text.section: Administrative hearings promulgated by administrative regulation under authority of this section shall be conducted in accordance with KRS Chapter 13B.

law.history: Amended 1998 Ky. Acts ch. 443, sec. 7, effective July 15, 1998. -- Amended 1996 Ky. Acts ch. 318, sec. 18, effective July 15, 1996. -- Amended 1988 Ky. Acts ch. 350, sec. 135, effective April 10, 1988. -- Created 1986 Ky. Acts ch. 423, sec. 180, effective July 1, 1987.
